mojo.description: Convert Spring Cloud Contract Verifier contracts into stubs mappings. This goal allows you to generate `stubs-jar` or execute `spring-cloud-contract:run` with generated mappings.

parameter.name: contractsDirectory
parameter.description: Directory containing Spring Cloud Contract Verifier contracts written using the GroovyDSL.

parameter.name: contractsMode
parameter.description: Picks the mode in which stubs will be found and registered.

parameter.name: contractsPath
parameter.description: The path in the JAR with all the contracts where contracts for this particular service lay. If not provided will be resolved to groupid/artifactid. Example: If groupid is com.example and artifactid is service then the resolved path will be /com/example/artifactid

parameter.name: contractsProperties
parameter.description: Map of properties that can be passed to custom org.springframework.cloud.contract.stubrunner.StubDownloaderBuilder.

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryPassword
parameter.description: The password to be used to connect to the repo with contracts.

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryProxyHost
parameter.description: The proxy host to be used to connect to the repo with contracts.

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryProxyPort
parameter.description: The proxy port to be used to connect to the repo with contracts.

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryUrl
parameter.description: The URL from which a JAR containing the contracts should get downloaded. If not provided but artifactid / coordinates notation was provided then the current Maven's build repositories will be taken into consideration

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryUsername
parameter.description: The user name to be used to connect to the repo with contracts.

parameter.name: convertToYaml
parameter.description: If true then will convert contracts to a YAML representation.

parameter.name: deleteStubsAfterTest
parameter.description: If set to false will NOT delete stubs from a temporary folder after running tests.

parameter.name: excludeBuildFolders
parameter.description: If true then any file laying in a path that contains build or target will get excluded in further processing.

parameter.name: failOnNoContracts
parameter.description: When enabled, this flag will tell stub runner to throw an exception when no stubs / contracts were found.

parameter.name: incrementalContractStubs
parameter.description: If set to true then stubs are created only when contracts have changed since last build.

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: Directory containing contracts written using the GroovyDSL This parameter is only used when goal is executed outside of maven project.

parameter.name: stubsDirectory
parameter.description: Directory where the generated WireMock stubs from Groovy DSL should be placed. You can then mention them in your packaging task to create jar with stubs

mojo.description: Picks the converted .json files and creates a jar. Requires convert to be executed first.

parameter.name: excludedFiles
parameter.description: Patterns that should not be taken into account for processing.

parameter.name: failOnNoContracts
parameter.description: When enabled, this flag will tell stub runner to throw an exception when no stubs / contracts were found.

parameter.name: incrementalContractStubsJar
parameter.description: If set to true then stubs jar is created only when stubs have changed since last build.

parameter.name: jarSkip
parameter.description: Set this to "true" to bypass only JAR creation.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Set this to "true" to bypass the whole Verifier execution.

mojo.description: From the provided directory with contracts generates the acceptance tests on the producer side.

parameter.name: assertJsonSize
parameter.description: Incubating feature. You can check the size of JSON arrays. If not turned on explicitly will be disabled.

parameter.name: baseClassMappings
parameter.description: A way to override any base class mappings. The keys are regular expressions on the package name of the contract and the values FQN to a base class for that given expression. Example of a mapping .*.com.example.v1..* -> com.example.SomeBaseClass When a contract's package matches the provided regular expression then extending class will be the one provided in the map - in this case com.example.SomeBaseClass.

parameter.name: contractsMode
parameter.description: Picks the mode in which stubs will be found and registered.

parameter.name: contractsPath
parameter.description: The path in the JAR with all the contracts where contracts for this particular service lay. If not provided will be resolved to groupid/artifactid. Example: If groupid is com.example and artifactid is service then the resolved path will be /com/example/artifactid

parameter.name: contractsProperties
parameter.description: Map of properties that can be passed to custom org.springframework.cloud.contract.stubrunner.StubDownloaderBuilder.

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryPassword
parameter.description: The password to be used to connect to the repo with contracts.

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryProxyHost
parameter.description: The proxy host to be used to connect to the repo with contracts.

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryProxyPort
parameter.description: The proxy port to be used to connect to the repo with contracts.

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryUrl
parameter.description: The URL from which a contracts should get downloaded. If not provided but artifactid / coordinates notation was provided then the current Maven's build repositories will be taken into consideration.

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryUsername
parameter.description: The user name to be used to connect to the repo with contracts.

parameter.name: deleteStubsAfterTest
parameter.description: If set to false will NOT delete stubs from a temporary folder after running tests.

parameter.name: excludedFiles
parameter.description: Patterns that should not be taken into account for processing.

parameter.name: failOnInProgress
parameter.description: If set to true then if any contracts that are in progress are found, will break the build. On the producer side you need to be explicit about the fact that you have contracts in progress and take into consideration that you might be causing false positive test execution results on the consumer side.

parameter.name: failOnNoContracts
parameter.description: When enabled, this flag will tell stub runner to throw an exception when no stubs / contracts were found.

parameter.name: ignoredFiles
parameter.description: Patterns for which Spring Cloud Contract Verifier should generate @Ignored tests.

parameter.name: imports
parameter.description: Imports that should be added to generated tests.

parameter.name: includedFiles
parameter.description: Patterns that should be taken into account for processing.

parameter.name: incrementalContractTests
parameter.description: If set to true then tests are created only when contracts have changed since last build.

parameter.name: packageWithBaseClasses
parameter.description: A package that contains all the base clases for generated tests. If your contract resides in a location src/test/resources/contracts/com/example/v1/ and you provide the packageWithBaseClasses value to com.example.contracts.base then we will search for a test source file that will have the package com.example.contracts.base and name ExampleV1Base. As you can see it will take the two last folders to and attach Base to its name.

parameter.name: staticImports
parameter.description: Static imports that should be added to generated tests.

mojo.description: Display help information on spring-cloud-contract-maven-plugin. Call mvn spring-cloud-contract:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.

mojo.description: The generated stubs get committed to the SCM repo and pushed to origin.

parameter.name: contractsMode
parameter.description: Picks the mode in which stubs will be found and registered.

parameter.name: contractsProperties
parameter.description: Map of properties that can be passed to custom org.springframework.cloud.contract.stubrunner.StubDownloaderBuilder.

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryPassword
parameter.description: The password to be used to connect to the repo with contracts.

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryUrl
parameter.description: The URL from which a contracts should get downloaded. If not provided but artifactid / coordinates notation was provided then the current Maven's build repositories will be taken into consideration.

parameter.name: contractsRepositoryUsername
parameter.description: The user name to be used to connect to the repo with contracts.

parameter.name: deleteStubsAfterTest
parameter.description: If set to false will NOT delete stubs from a temporary folder after running tests.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Set this to "true" to bypass the whole Verifier execution.

parameter.name: taskSkip
parameter.description: Set this to "true" to bypass only JAR creation.

parameter.name: httpPort
parameter.description: HTTP port for the WireMock server that serves stubs.

parameter.name: maxPort
parameter.description: Maximal port at which the stub should start.

parameter.name: minPort
parameter.description: Minimal port at which the stub should start.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Set this to "true" to bypass verifier execution.

parameter.name: skipTestOnly
parameter.description: Set this to "true" to bypass verifier test generation.

parameter.name: stubs
parameter.description: List of stubs to be downloaded and ran in a colon separated Ivy notation.

parameter.name: stubsClassifier
parameter.description: Classifier used by stubs artifacts.

parameter.name: waitForKeyPressed
parameter.description: Should the plugin wait for the user to press the key after starting the stubs.
